about_the_game:
This is a collection of door tiles in a variety of designs.
So what sort of doors, you ask?
Well...Doors to secret forests, steampunk doors, doors to the Devil King's chamber, entrance/exit to the ruins, and more!
This is a great value set that is perfect for expanding your map design for added details!
As a bonus, we have also added a sample project that contains 10 maps using these doors as an example!

・Original door image (including light & dark difference) x 54 pieces
・Project data including 10 bonus sample maps


・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
